alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:31AM EDT until July 21 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ATLANTIC AND SOUTHEASTERN OCEAN COUNTIES... At 730 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bass River State Forest to near Ventnor City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Atlantic City, Brigantine, Tuckerton, Surf City, Beach Haven West, Mystic Island and Manahawkin. This includes the following highways... Garden State Parkway between mile markers 56 and 64. Atlantic City Expressway near mile marker 0. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
